meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bridget McNulty Amy Young Tim Aten Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7421.

td.p: Bridget McNulty, an analytical chemist from Phoenixville, Pennsylvania
Amy Young, a public health graduate student from Corvallis, Oregon
Tim Aten, an editor from Vermilion, Ohio (whose 6-day cash winnings total $101,899)

tr.td: THE POPES
ISLAND NATIONS
PLAN AN ANAGRAM
BASKETBALL
CIRCLE TIME
BEN & JERRY'S FLAVOR GRAVEYARD

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
